project.name: gisgraphy
project.description: Gisgraphy goal is to provide tools to use free GIS Data on the Web. Actually it manage Geonames and OpenStreetMap (100 million entries). it provides an importer to inject the data into a strongly typed Postgres / Postgis database and use them via webservices : worldwide geocoding, worldwide reverse geocoding, fulltext and find nearby. Results can be output in XML, Atom, RSS, JSON, PHP, Ruby, and Python.
